column2: The Betawis are a mix Dutch and Javan people. Our position in the East Indies is tenuous now with the small Dutch population so we must open up the government to more people if we want to be able to maintain our dominance on the region.

With the acceptance of the Betawis we have been able to grow into a fine country. Now we should begin investing more into the people and provide means for which they too can be included in our government.
